contentitemdata.kenticocommunity.linkcon.LinkContentLabel: Using Page Builder With Custom Routing in Xperience by Kentico
contentitemdata.kenticocommunity.linkcon.LinkContentShortDescription: Xperience by Kentico's page tree-based URL routing keeps things simple for marketers building a new website. But, it also enables custom routing to give developers full control when needed. How does it work? Tyler Stirtz, from Kentico Gold partner BizStream, shows us with a real world scenario - 404 and error pages.
